title: Joubert Horn
text:
Joubert Prinsloo Horn (born 8 October 1988) is a former <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>n <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player whose usual playing position was <a href="Rugby%20union%20positions%23Locks">lock</a>. He played first class rugby between 2010 and 2016; he played for South African domestic teams the and before a spell with Italian side <a href="Viadana%20Rugby">Viadana</a> in 2013. After a short return to South Africa to play for the , he moved to France, where he played for <a href="Soyaux%20Angoul%C3%AAme%20XV%20Charente">Soyaux Angoulême XV Charente</a> and . He returned to South Africa in 2016 to play for the , before announcing his retirement at the end of the year.
Rugby career.
Horn represented the in the <a href="Varsity%20Cup">Varsity Cup</a> between 2010 and 2012 and he also played <a href="Currie%20Cup">Currie Cup</a> First Division rugby for the during this time. He moved west to join ahead of the <a href="2013%20Vodacom%20Cup">2013 Vodacom Cup</a> season making his debut against the on 9 March 2013 and made five appearances, but was not retained for the <a href="2013%20Currie%20Cup%20Premier%20Division">2013 Currie Cup Premier Division</a>.
He then had a short spell at Italian side <a href="Viadana%20Rugby">Viadana</a>, making twelve appearances in the 2013–14 <a href="Top12">National Championship of Excellence</a> and <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20European%20Challenge%20Cup">European Challenge Cup</a> competitions, before returning to South Africa to play for the in the <a href="2014%20Vodacom%20Cup">2014 Vodacom Cup</a> competition.
However, his return to South Africa was short-lived and he moved to <a href="France">French</a> <a href="F%C3%A9d%C3%A9rale%201">Fédérale 1</a> side <a href="Soyaux%20Angoul%C3%AAme%20XV%20Charente">Soyaux Angoulême XV Charente</a> prior to the 2014–2015 season.
In September 2015, he signed with <a href="Aviron%20Bayonnais">Aviron Bayonnais</a> for the 2015–2016 season, replacing <a href="Mark%20Chisholm">Mark Chisholm</a>. He will make his first appearance in <a href="Rugby%20Pro%20D2">Rugby Pro D2</a>.
